pages.text: White dye isn't difficult to get - just grind some azure bluets or oxeye daisies or white tulips. $(br2)To get light grey dye, mix some white and black dye. $(br2)$(br2)$(#999999)note: this is optional (as many things in this mod are) but is off by default. We might make this manual page conditionally visible in the future.$(reset)
